Super fun game to play with friends.

This game is fun enough to waste your life on while trying to ignore the horribly overpriced microtransactions bloating its current design structure. If you're playing a survivor, be sure to find and que with friends to increase the likelihood of survival above 0% against all the camping, tunneling tryhards. Given that this game will inevitably ruin friendships and you will have to play alone sometimes, queue as Claudette then stay in the tall grass until either the hatch or the gates are opened. If you're playing killer, remember to play Yakety Sax as it will help lower any mountaing frustration over every loop then the tension can be further eased by face-camping. When they complain about it at the end screen you can remind them that you were the one being punished for your actions by not patrolling the gens, and thus it doesn't matter it totally screwed over the survivor that got 85 points for being facecamped and ruins any fun. This tip won't help whenever you run into a group of survive-with-friends where all of them are running d-strike and bringing flashlights. The only solution for that is to run franklin's demise, hit the items out of their hands followed by a prompt disconnect as that'll lose their items along with screwing over their ranking and points. The devs call these strategies "fair and balanced".
Бегал 20 мин от мана ни одного гена не завели.

It is time to update my review as my feelings about this game have drastically changed within the last few weeks. To say I’m disappointed is putting it lightly. I have put over 5000 hours and money into this game. I am not happy at all with what Behaviour has been doing with the game lately as it has been continuingly getting worse. A few months ago, they released The Twins. A killer with an awful design that has a terrible experience on both sides. If you ask me, they should have never been released in that state. Recently, they were called out for ignoring requests for accessibility changes to the game that people have been asking for, for years. They threw together a photo that showed scratch marks with different shades of color and said that they’re working on it in response only after people with a sizeable following started speaking out. And now? They put forth a Public Test Build a few weeks ago that overhauled the UI and survivor movement that a lot of people weren’t happy with and which a lot of people didn’t ask for, but they went ahead and pushed it to Live anyways cause they thought that people playing the PTB was a small percentage of the community. I don’t usually put this kind of review out but I feel new and potential returning players have a right to know where this game is at right now. They recently put out a tweet that says they’re working on a solution to our feedback, but until then, I’m leaving this review up.
Game is best with friends. Lots of fun. :D

Игра конечно хорошая, но так как это DBD,то расскажу кое что новичкам в этой игре, думаю более опытные игроки меня поймут, в игре много багов и нелогичных вещей, а именно: ты не всегда можешь быстро запрыгнуть в окно( хотя в реальной жизни я бы прыгал в это ебучее окно вперед бошкой, лишь бы перелесть); тебя могут хитануть когда ты уже почти через нее перелез; если ты прыгнул в окно экскаватора и почти преземлился на землю, то при ударе маньяком в пустой окно, проходит урон; такой перк как осколок бесполезен когда ты не одержимость, так как нужно "завиглится" до 25%, но главная проблема в том, что даже после обновления крюки должны "сравнится" в 24 метрах друг об друга, а по факту спаунятся в 7-10 метрах и "завиглится" просто невозможно; одержимость дается рандом, и даже когда ты поставил такие перки как "глазик" и "осколок" вместе, то одержимостью может стать тот, кто взял лишь "осколок"; и на конец это "авто-аим" на маньяках, ты пытаешься закрутить 360 и получаешь 180 по ебалу, но когда ты играешь за мага и уже бьешь в резко заворачивающего сурва, то тебя разворачивает на 180 и ты попадаешь в стену))

Теперь немного про геймплей:
Первые часиков 20-50 ты прячешься от маньяка во всех углах карты, после 50 часов ты уже не боишься маньяка, но мансить не умеешь и часто получаешь по шапке за мага, в это время за маньяка еще очень легко играть и делаешь -4, после 100 часов ты уже хорошо попадаешь в skillcheak'и, но мансить так же плохо, после 200 часов ты уже начинаешь хорошо мансить и игра за сурва становиться приятна, в то же время за маньяка начинается АД, а именно: каждый сура начинает мансить и сбрасывать на тебя ВСЕ палеты, а как только ты поднимаешься до ранга 10, то все сурвы начинают приседать по палетки и щёлкать фонариком, тебя начинает это выбешивать и в добавок в конце катки убегают все сурвы... 
Игру конечно рекомендую из-за своей атмосферы и добротного геймплея за сурва, и если позадротить за маньяка, то и за него можно научиться играть. Ребят очень рекомендую игру! И удачи вам в дальнейшем, надеюсь мой обзор помог вам.

"Dead By Daylight" is definitely one of the best games I've ever played. At first I had some lagg problems, but then I figured out that if you change the graphic settings to low that the game works much more lagg free. And thankfully the graphic settings difference isn't that big of a deal! The graphics are still beautiful at "very low," and it doesn't make me miss anything, which is awesome, because paying attention to your surroundings is **KEY** if you're not great at running the killer around, or if you don't want to miss any sneaky survivors!

This game is quite fun. There are many perks that allow you to play in different ways, the characters are nice to learn about and play as, it sets it's atmosphere very nicely, and the devs seem to be involved with the community at least a little bit. However, it does have it's fair share of problems, such as a few toxic players here and there, it's matchmaking system (which might be fixed by the start of 2019), etc. Besides that, this game is something I would definitely recommend to other people, and I would especially recommend to play it with friends.

[h1]Dead By Daylight[/h1]

This game is one of my favorite games of recent years because of how unique it is. 
It is very unbalanced mainly due to the design of the maps and the overall quality of the community.

That being said I still play this game quite a bit.
The character progress in this game is slow and grindy so expect to put hours into it if you want to get anywhere.
The only game mode available can get old after a while but there is a variety in the perks(abilities) you have and there are different playstyle you can take to achieve your goal. 
The gameplay is addicting but most it feels rewarding when you play and do well.
glhf
Fun to play with friends

Dead by Daylight is by far one of the best purchases I have ever made. The amount of fun I have had playing this game, whether alone or with friends, is monumental. I look forward to it's continued developement.

Challenging game for starters, prepare to invest time. The learning curve can be quite high. More fun with friends via voice com. Can be frustrating at times for solo players due to obvious advantages in survival with friends. Advise: play both killer and survivor, it will help your ability to play "good" a lot.

Honetly, this game is great. It really is especially if you're a fan of horror movies or creepypastas. Playing as survivor has this certain thrill of running away from something you truly fear (unless its freddy krueger ironically) and playing as the killer grants you the satisfaction of hunting. The game is constantly adding new characters and maps and the community can be a fun toxic happy place for horrorcore fans.

ALSO THEY ADDING BUNCH OF WAIFU MONSTER BITCHES SO GET ON THIS SHIT

Mon coeur balance entre pouce bleu et pouce rouge et pour des raisons bien précises.

Pouce bleu car le concept du jeu est génial, vous incarnez au choix un tueur (michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, etc...) ou 1 survivant parmi une equipe de 4. Le premier doit tuer les survivants quant aux autres, ils doivent s'échapper en risquant leur vie a tout moment! (frissons garantis!)

Autant être clair le jeu est (a mon avis) bien plus interessant du côté tueur. L'idée d'incarner une légende de l'horreur/épouvante et de se mettre a zigouiller pour pendre les malheureux a un crochet et les sacrifier a L'ENTITE!!!!!! (ou pas...) Quoi de plus jouissif! 

A tout cela s'ajoute (pour les tueurs et les survivants) jusque 4 compétences qui permettent d'apprecier le jeu encore plus.

Les survivants n'ont aucun moyen (in-game, je reviendrais la dessus plus tard......) de communiquer a part quelques gestes basiques. Ils sont donc 4 mais livrés a eux mêmes. Avec un peu d'intelligence, ces derniers se regroupent afin d'accomplir le premier objectif du jeu, remettre en route l'éléctricité aux moyens de generateurs a réparer. Ceci fait ils doivent ensuite ouvrir au moins une des 2 portes de sorties de la zone afin de s'en échapper et cela en évitant de se faire attraper par le tueur! (il existe aussi une trappe cachée pour les plus filous d'entre vous!)

MAIS!!!!!!!!     Pouce rouge! 

Autant le jeu et son concept sont super, autant la communauté est toxique au plus haut point!!!!!
Entre le tueur qui va facecamp un survivant pendu comme un saucisson a son crochet par pur sadisme et etre sur qu'il va rejoindre papa Entité, ou alors des survivants qui se prennent pour Rambo armés d'une lampe torche et qui courent de palette en palette pendant que ses petits copains s'organisent via teamspeak pour réparer les générateurs, vous vous retrouvez impuissant, face a une équipe de troll qui profite des mécaniqmes du jeu pour vous humilier in game mais aussi dans le chat de fin de partie, vous qualifiant de noob et j'en passe, comme 4 gosses de cité qui s'acharnent contre le petit Jean-François de la ribambelle de Perlinpinpin.

Conclusion : Jeu top, vous pouvez l'acheter, mais sachez qu'a partir d'un certain rang dans le jeu, vous vous heurterez au petits trouducs/kikoolol qui ne savent pas perdre dignement.

this game is too good for its price but its better with friends since there is no VOIP in-game. Maps are pretty neat, some of them needs a little tuning but overall its a game I would gladly recommend to anyone that is looking for some nice co-op experience.
